channel.title: Changing xp rate aslo LOOKING FOR CODER!
channel.description:
Hey everyone, i am just wondering how i can change the xp rate in my server, and how to change the ip of my client.
Btw server is running great though, and i am looking for a coder. If intrested ill automatically make you Co owner.

item.title: Changing xp rate aslo LOOKING FOR CODER!
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

And, change the numeral used in the EXP_RATE. It will do EXP_RATE * HIT.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing xp rate aslo LOOKING FOR CODER!
item.dc:creator: @Deadly-specz Deadly-specz
item.description:
@Deadly-specz wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:4, topic:273219”]if (FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double)(1500 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); }

Try that [;[/quote] umm i didnt understand that i am sorry, do you know what folder os something i can change it in?
